title: What are the available scholarships for international students to study abroad, especially high school graduates?  - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships

response.answer_text: EduPass is an organization providing information about scholarships for international students. The Fulbright Scholarship Program awards money to students for study abroad. The Hubert Humphrey Scholarship Program makes money available to international students. To win a scholarship to the United States under the Fulbright Program you are required to take the SAT. Google: Fulbright Scholarship program to learn the requirements. Emerging Global Leader Scholarships program awards scholarships go deserving students based on school performance and out of class projects. Students who demonstrate leadership by creating their own organization that helps on an international basis demonstrates strong leadership. Grades matter but organizational skills count as well.
Dear all, if your grades are MEDIOCRE OR HORRIBLE, please do not ask about scholarship. Know your place please.
